# Native Aot Docs

## Native AOT deployment model

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/native-aot/index.md): Learn what Native AOT deployments are and why you should consider using it as part of the publishing your app with .NET 7 and later.
- [Optimize AOT deployments](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/native-aot/optimizing.md): Learn about optimizing the outputs of AOT compilation for size and speed.
- [AOT diagnostics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/native-aot/diagnostics.md): Learn about diagnostics in Native AOT applications
- [Native code interop](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/native-aot/interop.md): Learn about native code interop with Native AOT.
- [Build native libraries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/native-aot/libraries.md): How to build native libraries with Native AOT
- [Cross-compilation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/native-aot/cross-compile.md): Instructions and limitations for cross-compilation
- [Security](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/native-aot/security.md): Learn about security features available with native AOT.
- [Intro to AOT warnings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/native-aot/fixing-warnings.md): Learn why warnings might be produced when publishing an application as Native AOT, how to address them, and how to make the application "AOT compatible."
- [Intrinsic APIs marked RequiresDynamicCode](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/native-aot/intrinsic-requiresdynamiccode-apis.md): Learn how the tooling recognizes certain patterns in calls to APIs annotated with RequiresDynamicCode.

## Children

- [Ios Like Platforms](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/native-aot/ios-like-platforms/llms.txt)
- [Warnings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/core/deploying/native-aot/warnings/llms.txt)
